[[inst_ld_add]]
==== LD.ADD

*Syntax:* ld.add<.{aq, rl, f, aqrl, aqf, rlf, aqrlf}> [SrcL], SrcR, {->t, ->u, ->Rd}

*Description:* Atomic Add operation: memory value is atomically added with register.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_ld_add.svg[LD.ADD encoding,width=800]

*Group:* AMO/AMO
